Package parser

Class CalcPile

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.CalcPile

  • public class CalcPile
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String[] ops
      defines methods to convert a postfix expression, obtained via the function.txt file, to Function and Functions java 8 objects, as defined in the intervals package, and that can be used to be plotted on a graph, as provided by the plotting package NOTE THE FOLLOWING WHENEVER ADDING FUNCTIONS: when adding a new operation (unitary or binary), always add it to the following constant arrays, and to the functions effectuerOperation, and effectuerOperationFunctions (binary) or effectuerOperationUni and effectuerOperationUniFunctions (unitatry)

    • Field Detail

      • ops

        public static final java.lang.String[] ops
        defines methods to convert a postfix expression, obtained via the function.txt file, to Function and Functions java 8 objects, as defined in the intervals package, and that can be used to be plotted on a graph, as provided by the plotting package NOTE THE FOLLOWING WHENEVER ADDING FUNCTIONS: when adding a new operation (unitary or binary), always add it to the following constant arrays, and to the functions effectuerOperation, and effectuerOperationFunctions (binary) or effectuerOperationUni and effectuerOperationUniFunctions (unitatry)
